actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1002 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the burial in a national cemetery of the parents of certain members of the Armed Forces who die in active service.

summary.text: Authorizes the burial in a national cemetery of the parents of any member of the Armed Forces whose death occurs under honorable conditions while such member was serving on active duty for a period of more than thirty days and when such member was the only child of such parents. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1002)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1002 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the burial in a national cemetery of the parents of certain members of the Armed Forces who die in active service.
